list.comment:
feat: Add network security config and update dummy data
This commit introduces a network security configuration file to allow cleartext traffic and updates the dummy event data with new image URLs and expanded details.
Key changes: - Added `app/src/main/res/xml/network_security_config.xml` to permit cleartext HTTP traffic. - Updated `DummyData.kt`: - Changed placeholder image URLs for events to `https://res.cloudinary.com/dsswvewxx/image/upload/*.jpg`. - Expanded the description and details for the first trending event. - Updated other event entries with new image URLs and consistent (placeholder) details.

task.summary: Default task

:tada: Initial commit
- Add basic Android project structure. - Configure Gradle build scripts and properties. - Add default .gitignore files. - Add basic app resources including launcher icons, colors, strings, and themes. - Add MainActivity with basic Compose UI. - Add Compose theme and typography definitions. - Add example unit and instrumented tests. - Add ProGuard rules. - Add AndroidManifest.xml. - Add backup and data extraction rules. - Add Gradle wrapper.

feat: Add google-services.json
- Integrate Firebase services configuration into the Android application. - The `google-services.json` file is added to the `app/` directory.

feat: Integrate Hilt and Firebase dependencies
- Add Hilt for dependency injection. - Add KSP for code generation. - Integrate Firebase services: Auth, Firestore, Storage, Messaging, Dynamic Links. - Add Retrofit and OkHttp for networking. - Add Kotlinx Serialization and Coroutines. - Add Coil for image loading. - Add ML Kit Barcode Scanning for QR code functionality. - Add Mockito for testing. - Update

feat: Initialize project structure
- Create directory structure for data, domain, presentation, ui, and utils layers. - Add placeholder files for screens, view models, use cases, models, repositories, navigation, constants, DI modules, and application class. - Add copyright headers to all newly created Kotlin files. - Configure DataModule with Firebase providers for Firestore, Auth, and Storage.

feat: Define data models
- Create `Event.kt` data class with fields: id, title, date, location, imageUrl, and details. - Create `Ticket.kt` data class with fields: id, eventId, qrCode, and status. - Create `User.kt` data class with fields: id, email, and name.

feat: Define domain layer use cases and repository interfaces
- Implement use cases for event and ticket operations: - `GetEventsUseCase`: Fetches a list of all events. - `GetEventDetailsUseCase`: Fetches details for a specific event. - `GetTicketsUseCase`: Fetches a list of all tickets. - `GetTicketUseCase`: Fetches details for a specific ticket. - `BookTicketUseCase`: Books a ticket for an event. - `LoginUseCase`: Handles user login. - Define repository interfaces for data abstraction: - `EventRepository`: Defines methods for event data operations, including adding events with optional image URIs. - `TicketRepository`: Defines methods for ticket data operations. - `UserRepository`: Defines methods for user authentication. - `StorageRepository`: Defines methods for image upload and deletion.

feat: Implement data repository logic
- Implement `EventRepositoryImpl` for fetching, getting details, and adding events, including image upload via `StorageRepository`. - Implement `TicketRepositoryImpl` for fetching, getting details, and booking tickets. - Implement `UserRepositoryImpl` for user login using Firebase Auth. - Implement `StorageRepositoryImpl` for uploading and deleting images in Firebase Storage.

feat: Implement repository providers in DataModule
- Add Hilt providers for `EventRepository`, `TicketRepository`, `UserRepository`, and `StorageRepository` implementations. - These providers inject the necessary Firebase dependencies (Firestore, Auth, Storage) into the respective repository implementations.

refactor: Update dependencies and remove unused code
- Update versions for Kotlin, Compose BOM, Hilt, Firebase services, Coil, Mockito, and other libraries in `libs.versions.toml`. - Update plugin versions in `build.gradle.kts` (project level). - Apply new plugins (google-ksp, kotlin-serialization, google-services, firebase-crashlytics, google-hilt) and remove deprecated KSP classpath in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Add dependencies for AndroidX Core Splashscreen, Navigation Compose, and Hilt Navigation Compose in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Remove unused `Greeting` Composable and its preview from `MainActivity.kt`. - Comment out NavController initialization in `MainActivity.kt`.

feat: Implement QR code generation and display for e-tickets
- Add `ETicketScreen.kt` to display ticket details and QR code. - Update `ETicketViewModel.kt` to load ticket data and convert QR code string to Bitmap. - Modify `BookingViewModel.kt` to generate a QR code upon successful ticket booking and store it as a Base64 string in the `Ticket` object. - Integrate `ETicketScreen` into `MainActivity.kt` navigation. - Replace `mlkit-barcode-scanning` with `zxing-core` for QR code generation. - Remove unused `QRScannerScreen.kt` and `QRScannerViewModel.kt`.

feat: Implement Event List Screen
- Add `EventListScreen.kt` composable to display a list of upcoming events. - Fetches events using `EventListViewModel`. - Displays event titles in a `LazyColumn`. - Navigates to event details screen on item click. - Create `EventListViewModel.kt` to manage UI state for the event list. - Injects `GetEventsUseCase` to retrieve event data. - Exposes a `StateFlow` of events. - Update `MainActivity.kt` to navigate to `EventListScreen` for the "event_list" route.

feat: Implement EventDetailScreen and ViewModel
- Create `EventDetailScreen.kt` to display event details including title, date, location, and details. - Add a "Book Ticket" button that navigates to the booking screen. - Create `EventDetailViewModel.kt` to fetch and provide event details to the screen. - Integrate `EventDetailScreen` into the navigation graph in `MainActivity.kt`. - Update copyright headers in `EventDetailScreen.kt` and `EventDetailViewModel.kt`.

feat: Implement Login Screen and LoginViewModel
- Add `LoginScreen.kt` with UI for email and password input and a login button. - Integrate `LoginViewModel` to handle login logic using `LoginUseCase`. - Navigate to `event_list` on successful login. - Update `MainActivity.kt` to include `LoginScreen` in the navigation graph. - Update copyright headers.

feat: Implement booking screen and BookingViewModel logic
- Create `BookingScreen.kt` Composable for event booking UI. - Displays event ID. - Includes a "Confirm Booking" button. - Shows a "Booking Successful!" message upon successful booking. - Navigates to the e-ticket screen after successful booking. - Update `BookingViewModel.kt`: - Modify `bookTicket` function to run in a coroutine scope and accept an `onSuccess` callback. - The `bookTicket` function now directly generates and updates the ticket with a QR code string.

feat: Update navigation
- Set up NavHost with composable routes for: - EventListScreen (start destination) - EventDetailScreen (takes eventId as argument) - BookingScreen (takes eventId as argument) - ETicketScreen (takes ticketId as argument) - TicketHistoryScreen - LoginScreen

feat: Implement Ticket History screen
- Create `TicketHistoryScreen.kt` to display a list of user's tickets. - Create `TicketHistoryViewModel.kt` to fetch ticket data using `GetTicketsUseCase`. - Integrate `TicketHistoryScreen` into the navigation graph in `MainActivity.kt`. - The screen shows the ticket ID and associated event ID for each ticket.

build: Configure Hilt and update dependencies
- Add Hilt for dependency injection by: - Adding `@HiltAndroidApp` to `LeapTechEventsApplication.kt`. - Adding `@AndroidEntryPoint` to `MainActivity.kt`. - Updating `app/build.gradle.kts` with Hilt and KSP plugin aliases and dependencies. - Updating `build.gradle.kts` (project level) with Hilt and KSP plugin aliases. - Updating `AndroidManifest.xml` to specify `LeapTechEventsApplication` as the application name. - Update Kotlin version to 2.0.21 and KSP version to 2.0.21-1.0.28 in `gradle/libs.versions.toml`. - Update various `.idea` configuration files. - Add Kotlin error log files to `.kotlin/errors/`.

feat: Add Firebase Realtime Database and Login Screen previews
- Integrate Firebase Realtime Database dependency. - Add light and dark mode previews for `LoginScreen.kt` using a fake `LoginViewModel` and `LoginUseCase`. - Modify `LoginViewModel` and `LoginUseCase` to be open for extension in preview fakes.

refactor: Update LoginScreen UI using ConstraintLayout
- Replaced `Column` with `ConstraintLayout` for more flexible UI design. - Added a "Welcome Back" title. - Styled `OutlinedTextField` for email and password inputs with leading icons. - Implemented keyboard options for email and password fields (Email, Password, Next, Done). - Styled the "Login" button with a rounded shape and adjusted its height and text style. - Added `androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout-compose` dependency.

refactor: Update LoginScreen UI using ConstraintLayout
- Replaced `Column` with `ConstraintLayout` for more flexible UI design. - Added a "Welcome Back" title. - Styled `OutlinedTextField` for email and password inputs with leading icons. - Implemented keyboard options for email and password fields (Email, Password, Next, Done). - Styled the "Login" button with a rounded shape and adjusted its height and text style. - Added `androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout-compose` dependency.

feat: Enhance Splash Screen with Gradient Button and Navigation
- Add a "Get Started" `GradientButton` to `SplashScreen.kt`. - Implement navigation from `SplashActivity` to `MainActivity` on button click. - Make `SplashActivity` the launcher activity in `AndroidManifest.xml`. - Update theme `Theme.LeapTechEventsAndroid` to inherit from `Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar`. - Remove `app/build.gradle` and `.env.example` as they are no longer needed. - Update IntelliJ IDEA project files (`.idea/workspace.xml`, `.idea/deploymentTargetSelector.xml`). - Remove unused module file `.idea/modules/app/Leap_Tech_Events_-_Android.app.iml`.

feat: Introduce Get Started Screen and Refactor Splash
This commit introduces a new `GetStartedScreen` and refactors the initial app flow.
Key changes: - Created `GetStartedScreen.kt`: - Displays a title, subtitle, and an image (`ticket_01.png`). - Features a "Get Started" `GradientButton`. - Uses a vertical gradient background with `dark_purple` and `light_purple`. - Updated `MainActivity.kt`: - Set `get_started` as the initial route in `NavHost`. - Navigation from `GetStartedScreen` to `LoginScreen` on button click. - Removed `SplashActivity.kt` as its functionality is replaced by `GetStartedScreen`. - Updated `AndroidManifest.xml`: - `MainActivity` is now the launcher activity. - Modified `GradientButton.kt`: - Refactored to use a horizontal gradient for the button background. - Improved styling and layout. - Updated `colors.xml`: - Added `dark_purple` color resource. - Updated `strings.xml`: - Modified `subtitle_splash` for brevity. - Cleaned up `app/build.gradle.kts` by removing extra newlines.

feat: Initial setup for HomeScreen with placeholder content
This commit introduces the `HomeScreen.kt` Composable and basic data structures for events.
Key changes: - Created `HomeScreen.kt`: - Uses `Scaffold` with a `TopAppBar`. - `TopAppBar` includes a title "LeapTech Events", a menu icon, and a profile icon. - The content area is a `LazyColumn` with a `dark_purple` background. - Includes a placeholder `Box` for an event item, which is clickable. - Placeholder `TODO()` calls for `modifier`, `bottomBar`, `snackbarHost`, `floatingActionButton`, `floatingActionButtonPosition`, `containerColor`, `contentColor`, and `contentWindowInsets` within the `Scaffold`. - Created `DummyData.kt`: - Defines an `Event` data class with various properties like `id`, `title`, `imageUrl`, `date`, `time`, etc. - Includes lists of sample event data: `trendingEvents`, `musicEvents`, `entertainmentEvents`, and `otherEvents`. - Updated IntelliJ IDEA project files (`.idea/workspace.xml`, `.idea/misc.xml`).

feat: Enhance HomeScreen with Image Loading and Preview
This commit enhances the `HomeScreen.kt` Composable with image loading capabilities and adds a preview function.
Key changes: - Updated `HomeScreen.kt`: - Removed placeholder `TODO()` calls from `Scaffold`. - Implemented image loading for event items using `AsyncImage` from Coil. - Added an overlay with a `LeapTechLogo` on the main event image. - Added `@Preview` Composable `HomeScreenPreview` for design-time visualization. - Added `INTERNET` permission to `AndroidManifest.xml` to allow image loading from URLs. - Updated IntelliJ IDEA project files (`.idea/deploymentTargetSelector.xml`, `.idea/workspace.xml`).

feat: Enhance HomeScreen with Search Bar, Trending Events, and Local Image
This commit significantly updates the `HomeScreen.kt` Composable to provide a richer user experience.
Key changes: - Replaced the `TopAppBar` title text with the `leaptechlogo.png` image. - Increased the height of the main event image container. - Replaced the main event `AsyncImage` with a local drawable `mainevent_03.png`. - Added a non-editable `OutlinedTextField` as a placeholder search bar that triggers `onSearchClick` when clicked. - Implemented a "Trending 🔥" section using a `LazyRow` to display `EventCard`s. - Introduced `EventCard` Composable to display individual event details (image, title, date, location). - Added new drawable assets: `mainevent_01.png`, `mainevent_02.png`, `mainevent_03.png`, and `mainevent_04.png`. - Enhanced `HomeScreenPreview` with light and dark mode configurations.

feat: Expand HomeScreen with additional event categories
This commit enhances the `HomeScreen.kt` Composable by adding more categories of events below the "Trending" section.
Key changes: - Added `LazyRow` sections for: - "Music" events, displaying items from `musicEvents`. - "Entertainment" events, displaying items from `entertainmentEvents`. - "BackStage Group" events, displaying specific items (id 9 and 10) from `otherEvents`. - "Trend" events, displaying specific items (id 11 and 12) from `otherEvents`. - Each new section includes a title `Text` Composable and uses `EventCard` to display individual events.

feat: Enhance EventCard with optional type chip and update Event data model
This commit introduces an optional event type chip to the `EventCard` Composable and updates the `Event` data model with default values and an `EventType` enum.
Key changes: - Modified `EventCard.kt`: - Added an optional `showTypeChip` boolean parameter (defaulting to `false`). - If `showTypeChip` is true, a small `Card` displaying the `event.type.name` is overlaid on the top-start of the event image. - Increased the default height of `EventCard` from `220.dp` to `240.dp`. - Updated `DummyData.kt`: - Introduced an `EventType` enum with various event categories (TRENDING, MUSIC, ENTERTAINMENT, etc.). - Modified the `Event` data class: - Provided default values for all properties. - Changed the `type` property from `String` to the new `EventType` enum. - Updated `trendingEvents`, `musicEvents`, and `entertainmentEvents` to use the new `EventType`. - In `HomeScreen.kt`: - Set `showTypeChip = true` for `EventCard`s in the "Trending" section. - Updated the main event placeholder to include default values for newly added `Event` properties.

feat: Add Coil SVG and OkHttp dependencies, and configure ImageLoader
This commit introduces dependencies for Coil SVG support and OkHttp, and configures a custom `ImageLoader` in the `LeapTechEventsApplication` class.
Key changes: - Added `io.coil-kt:coil-svg:2.4.0` and `com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:4.11.0` to `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Modified `LeapTechEventsApplication.kt`: - Implemented `ImageLoaderFactory` to provide a custom `ImageLoader`. - Configured the `ImageLoader` with: - Crossfade enabled. - An `OkHttpClient` that follows redirects. - Enabled memory and disk cache policies. - Memory cache with 25% of available memory. - Disk cache in `cacheDir/image_cache` with 2% of disk space. - Added `SvgDecoder.Factory()` to support SVG image loading. - Updated `AndroidManifest.xml`: - Added `android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config"`. - Set `android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"`. - Updated placeholder image URLs in `DummyData.kt` to `https://placehold.co/600x400` and expanded event details for the first trending event.

feat: Add network security config and update dummy data
This commit introduces a network security configuration file to allow cleartext traffic and updates the dummy event data with new image URLs and expanded details.
Key changes: - Added `app/src/main/res/xml/network_security_config.xml` to permit cleartext HTTP traffic. - Updated `DummyData.kt`: - Changed placeholder image URLs for events to `https://res.cloudinary.com/dsswvewxx/image/upload/*.jpg`. - Expanded the description and details for the first trending event. - Updated other event entries with new image URLs and consistent (placeholder) details.

Key changes: - Added `io.coil-kt:coil-svg:2.4.0` and `com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:4.11.0` to `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Modified `LeapTechEventsApplication.kt`: - Implemented `ImageLoaderFactory` to provide a custom `ImageLoader`. - Configured the `ImageLoader` with: - Crossfade enabled. - An `OkHttpClient` that follows redirects. - Enabled memory and disk cache policies. - Memory cache with 25% of available memory. - Disk cache in `cacheDir/image_cache` with 2% of disk space. - Added `SvgDecoder.Factory()` to support SVG image loading. - Updated `AndroidManifest.xml`: - Added `android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config"`. - Set `android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"`. - Updated placeholder image URLs in `DummyData.kt` to `https://placehold.co/600x400` and expanded event details for the first trending event.
